Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of aerosol spray paint cans and broad tipped indelible markers.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale of aerosol spray paint cans and broad tipped indelible markers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the purchase and use of etching pens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Purchase and use of etching pens.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the publication of quarterly reports by the New York City Police Department on quality of life summonses issued and graffiti-related arrests made.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Submission of quarterly reports by the NYPD on quality of life summonses issued and graffiti-related arrests made.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale and display of aerosol spray paint caps.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale and display of aerosol spray paint caps.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Senate to reintroduce S.2377 of 2009, which would amend the New York State Penal Law in relation to increasing penalties for the offenses of making graffiti and possession of graffiti instruments, and calling upon the New York State Assembly to introduce and pass a companion bill, and for the Governor to sign such legislation into law.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Penal Law to increase penalties for the offenses of making graffiti and possession of graffiti instruments. (S.2377)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass S.585/A.6725 of 2011, which would amend the New York State Penal Law in relation to enabling judges to sentence those convicted of graffiti offenses to repair, replace and clean the property they and other vandals have damaged, and for the Governor to sign such legislation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enabling judges to sentence those convicted of graffiti offenses to repair, replace and clean the property they and other vandals have damaged. (S.585/A.6725)

Items.Title: Oversight - Tagging out Vandals – Graffiti Prevention and Removal in NYC.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Tagging out Vandals – Graffiti Prevention and Removal in NYC.
